official_title: A bill to name the social security building in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, known as the Mid-Atlantic Program Service Center, the William A. Barrett Social Security Building.

summary.text: Designates the Mid-Atlantic Program Service Center in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, as the William A. Barrett Social Security Building.
